channel.title: CVE Feed for dproxy-nexgen -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for dproxy-nexgen -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2169|2024-09-04T12:04:51.230Z -- dproxy-nexgen -- dproxy-nexgen
item.description: Implementations of UDP application protocol are vulnerable to network loops. An unauthenticated attacker can use maliciously-crafted packets against a vulnerable implementation that can lead to Denial of Service (DOS) and/or abuse of resources.
